mapper.insert: insert into t_yz (sid, patient_id, visit_no, member_id, yz_id, yz_group_id, yz_item_type, yz_type, yz_item_name, yz_item_code, drug_dose, drug_dose_unit, drug_dose_unit_desc, drug_freq_code, drug_freq_desc, drug_duration_code, drug_duration_desc, drug_specification, doctor_code, doctor_name, start_date, start_time, stop_date, stop_time, price, skin_test, emergency,insert_dt,priority_code,record_origin,use_plan_json ,use_drug_way ,yz_status ,yz_explain ,ext_data ,start_dt ,stop_dt ,foreign_id ,department_id ,hospital_id,executive_departments_name ,card_no ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{yzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzItemType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{yzType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{yzItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugDose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugDoseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugDoseUnitDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugFreqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugFreqDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugDurationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugDurationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skinTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(),#{priorityCode}, #{recordOrigin},#{usePlanJson} ,#{useDrugWay} ,#{yzStatus} ,#{yzExplain} ,#{extData} ,#{startDt} ,#{stopDt} ,#{foreignId} ,#{departmentId} ,#{hospitalId},#{executiveDepartmentsName} ,#{cardNo} )
mapper.select: select sid, patient_id, visit_no, member_id, yz_id, yz_group_id, yz_item_type, yz_type, yz_item_name, yz_item_code, drug_dose, drug_dose_unit, drug_dose_unit_desc, drug_freq_code, drug_freq_desc, drug_duration_code, drug_duration_desc, drug_specification, doctor_code, doctor_name, start_date, start_time, stop_date, stop_time, price, skin_test, emergency, priority_code, insert_dt, record_origin, hospital_id, department_id, doctor_id, is_valid, use_drug_way, yz_status, yz_explain, start_dt, stop_dt, foreign_id, use_plan_json, ext_data ,card_no FROM t_yz t WHERE is_valid = 1 and t.yz_id = #{yzId} limit 1

select sid, patient_id, visit_no, member_id, yz_id, yz_group_id, yz_item_type, yz_type, yz_item_name, yz_item_code, drug_dose, drug_dose_unit, drug_dose_unit_desc, drug_freq_code, drug_freq_desc, drug_duration_code, drug_duration_desc, drug_specification, doctor_code, doctor_name, start_date, start_time, stop_date, stop_time, price, skin_test, emergency, priority_code, insert_dt, record_origin, hospital_id, department_id, doctor_id, is_valid, use_drug_way, yz_status, yz_explain, start_dt, stop_dt, foreign_id, use_plan_json, ext_data ,card_no FROM t_yz t WHERE t.sid = #{sid}

select sid, patient_id, visit_no, member_id, yz_id, yz_group_id, yz_item_type, yz_type, yz_item_name, yz_item_code, drug_dose, drug_dose_unit, drug_dose_unit_desc, drug_freq_code, drug_freq_desc, drug_duration_code, drug_duration_desc, drug_specification, doctor_code, doctor_name, start_date, start_time, stop_date, stop_time, price, skin_test, emergency, priority_code, insert_dt, record_origin, hospital_id, department_id, doctor_id, is_valid, use_drug_way, yz_status, yz_explain, start_dt, stop_dt, foreign_id, use_plan_json, ext_data ,card_no FROM t_yz t WHERE t.member_id = #{memberId}

select sid, patient_id, visit_no, member_id, yz_id, yz_group_id, yz_item_type, yz_type, yz_item_name, yz_item_code, drug_dose, drug_dose_unit, drug_dose_unit_desc, drug_freq_code, drug_freq_desc, drug_duration_code, drug_duration_desc, drug_specification, doctor_code, doctor_name, start_date, start_time, stop_date, stop_time, price, skin_test, emergency, priority_code, insert_dt, record_origin, hospital_id, department_id, doctor_id, is_valid, use_drug_way, yz_status, yz_explain, start_dt, stop_dt, foreign_id, use_plan_json, ext_data ,card_no FROM t_yz t WHERE t.member_id = #{memberId} and t.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} and t.yz_item_type = #{yzItemType} and t.is_valid = 1

SELECT ifnull(v.visit_type,'其他') visitType,z.sid,z.price,z.`doctor_name` doctorName,z.`yz_type` yzType,z.`yz_item_name` yzItemName, z.`drug_dose` drugDose,ifnull(z.`drug_dose_unit`,drug_dose_unit_desc) drugDoseUnit,z.`drug_freq_code` drugFreqCode,z.`drug_freq_desc` drugFreqDesc,z.`start_date` startDate,z.`stop_date` stopDate FROM `t_yz` z JOIN `t_member_visit` v ON v.`visit_no`=z.`visit_no` and v.member_id=z.member_id WHERE z.`yz_item_type`=1 AND z.`member_id`= #{memberId} order by z.sid desc

SELECT `sid`,`patient_id`, `visit_no`,`member_id`,`yz_id`,`yz_group_id`,`yz_item_type`,`yz_type`,`yz_item_name`,`yz_item_code`,`drug_dose`,`drug_dose_unit`,`drug_dose_unit_desc`,`drug_freq_code`, `drug_freq_desc`, `drug_duration_code`,`drug_duration_desc`,`drug_specification`, `doctor_code`,`doctor_name`,`start_date`,`start_time`,`stop_date`,`stop_time`,`price`,`skin_test`,`emergency` FROM t_yz WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND start_date=#{startDate} AND yz_item_type = "1" order by sid DESC

select ty.sid,ty.yz_item_name,ty.drug_specification,ty.drug_freq_desc,ty.drug_freq_code,ty.start_date,ty.drug_dose, ty.drug_dose_unit from t_yz ty,t_member_checkin_info tc where ty.yz_item_type=1 and ty.member_id=#{memberId} and ty.priority_code = 'OUT' and tc.member_id=ty.member_id and ty.start_date >= tc.in_hospital_date order by ty.sid DESC
SELECT MAX(start_date) FROM t_yz t WHERE t.member_id = #{memberId} AND t.`yz_item_type`="1"

SELECT `sid`,`patient_id`, `visit_no`,`member_id`,`yz_id`,`yz_group_id`,`yz_item_type`,`yz_type`,`yz_item_name`,`yz_item_code`,`drug_dose`,`drug_dose_unit`,`drug_dose_unit_desc`,`drug_freq_code`, `drug_freq_desc`, `drug_duration_code`,`drug_duration_desc`,`drug_specification`, `doctor_code`,`doctor_name`,`start_date`,`start_time`,`stop_date`,`stop_time`,`price`,`skin_test`,`emergency` FROM t_yz WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND start_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND yz_item_type = '1' order by sid DESC

select t.sid, t.patient_id, t.visit_no, t.member_id, t.yz_id, t.yz_group_id, t.yz_item_type, t.yz_type, t.yz_item_name, t.yz_item_code, t.drug_dose, t.drug_dose_unit, t.drug_dose_unit_desc, t.drug_freq_code, t.drug_freq_desc, t.drug_duration_code, t.drug_duration_desc, t.drug_specification, t.doctor_code, t.doctor_name, t.start_date, t.start_time, t.stop_date, t.stop_time, t.price, t.skin_test, t.emergency, t.priority_code, t.insert_dt, t.record_origin, t.hospital_id, t.department_id, t.doctor_id, t.is_valid, t.use_drug_way, t.yz_status, t.yz_explain, t.start_dt, t.stop_dt, t.use_plan_json, t.ext_data ,q.checker_id,q.checker_name,q.check_dt,q.last_execute_time,w.department_name,w.bed_no,t.card_no, t.executive_departments_name ,q.checker_id,q.checker_name,q.check_dt,q.last_execute_time,w.department_name,w.bed_no from t_yz t left join t_yz_log q on t.yz_id = q.yz_id left join t_member_in_hospital_log w on w.is_valid = 1 and w.adm_no = t.visit_no where t.is_valid = 1 and t.yz_id = #{yzId} limit 1
mapper.update:
update t_yz t
t.yz_status = #{yzStatus},
t.stop_dt = #{stopDt},
t.stop_date = #{stopDate},
t.stop_time = #{stopTime},
t.start_date = #{startDate},
t.start_time = #{startTime},
t.start_dt = #{startDt},
t.is_valid = #{isValid},
yz_item_type = #{yzItemType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
yz_item_name = #{yzItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yz_item_code = #{yzItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_dose = #{drugDose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_dose_unit = #{drugDoseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_dose_unit_desc = #{drugDoseUnitDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_freq_code = #{drugFreqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_freq_desc = #{drugFreqDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_duration_code = #{drugDurationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_duration_desc = #{drugDurationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_specification = #{drugSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_drug_way = #{useDrugWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
yz_explain = #{yzExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_plan_json = #{usePlanJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ext_data = #{extData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where t.yz_id = #{yzId} and t.is_valid = 1
